name: Butterfly Gardeners VR
description:
You play as agent Monarch, a butterfly who works for Butteryfly Gardeners Corp. Your job is to fix people's gardens. You get paid in nectar cakes.

Controls:

  • - Flap your wings to fly up
  • - Triggers to move forward/backward
  • - joystick/touchpad to rotate
  • - A Button / Menu Button to discard item in hand

Goal:

  • Get all the flowers in the garden to bloom

How to Play:

  • - Transfer pollen from blooming flowers to regular flowers
  • - Chase and catch water bubbles and use it to water the plants

Reward:

  • Get your favorite nectar cake

Future Work:

  • Add Enemies who try to destroy your plants
  • Collect  Bug Spray to kill enemy bugs
  • Make Water Bubbles serve more than one plant as they're hard to chase and catch

Assets Used:

  • Garden Flowers Pack
  • Butterfly
  • Suburban House
  • Nature Shaders
  • SoundFX from FreeSound.com
  • Music from Royalty Free Music Pack
